question.title: `Execution failed for task ':app:configureCMakeDebug[arm64-v8a] React Native + EXPO
question.body:
The problem is down there saying:

Task: react-native-worklets:configureCMakeDebug[arm64-v8a] FAILED.

I tried everything that I found on the internet to fix this problem. I have changed Java destination folder installing it directly in C:\, JAVA_HOME is C:\Java, PATH: %JAVA_HOME%\bin and also C:\Program Files\Common Files\Oracle\Java\javapath

(I tried removing it, it reappears).

Then I tried changing Gradle versions. I think one was <8.10, then second one 8.10.2 (I think) and now 8.14.3, no fix.

I tried with every version setting newArchEnabled with false and true, no help.

I added org.gradle.java.home=C:\\\Java in gradle.properties, no change. Changed Java version from v24 to v21 and then to jdk 17.

FULL LOG:

When i set newArchEnabled=false:

> Configure project :react-native-video
Kotlin version is correct: 2.0.21
AndroidX version is correct: 1.9.3
useExoplayerIMA: false
useExoplayerSmoothStreaming: true
useExoplayerDash: true
useExoplayerHls: true
useExoplayerRtsp: false
buildFromSource: false

> Task :react-native-reanimated:assertNewArchitectureEnabledTask FAILED

[Incubating] Problems report is available at: file:///C:/Users/Public/Downloads/projekat1/GTube/Gtube/android/build/reports/problems/problems-report.html

> [Reanimated] Reanimated requires new architecture to be enabled. Please enable it by setting `newArchEnabled` to `true` in `gradle.properties`.

answers.body:
for react-native 0.82.1 (maybe other versions? who knows?)

  • install patch-package

  • make a clean install (npm install - BEFORE building the app - otherwise it gets all sorts of other stuff that patch-package can't handle)

  • edit node_modules/react-native-worklets-core/android/CMakeLists.txt

  • change hermes-engine::libhermes to hermes-engine::hermesvm (around line 84)

  • run patch-package (npx patch-package react-native-worklets-core)

  • (if you want to, run npm install again) (package is already OK - patch package ensure it stays OK)

  • clean build gradle and all that then:

rebuild and .... voilà !

I SHOW THIS ERROR ON GITHUB AND IT WORKS GO AHEAD MAYBE THIS WILL FAILED

npx patch-package react-native-worklets-core
**
But THEN START YOUR APPLICATION IT WILL WORK**

question_comments.body: Alright, post will be better formatted next time.
I added a gradle flag to the question, since the errors are generated by Gradle. The Gradle SMEs here may have more insight for you.

Thank you for converting your images to text - much appreciated. I tried to format the text to make it more readable. (Maybe next time, you can do this yourself. See the link in my first comment about formatting your content.)
I fixed it, didn't know how to copy from terminal.
Please take a look at why you should not upload images of code, data, errors when asking a question. You can replace these images with formatted text.

79769531.body: I did that and it says that newArchEnabled needs to be true for the version 8.14.3, if i try that for the older versions, it fails with same error just, lets say, at 64% of initialization.
